snippet: Police officials investigating the disappearance of Raymond Roth, who vanished off Jones Beach last week, said that they had not decided whether to charge him with a crime.
lead_paragraph: Police officials investigating the disappearance of Raymond Roth, who vanished off Jones Beach last week, said that they had not decided whether to charge him with a crime.

headline.seo: Raymond Roth, Suspected of Faking His Death, Returns to New York
headline.main: Man Suspected of Faking His Death Has Returned to New York, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Man Suspected of Faking His Death Has Returned to New York, Officials Say
